root.name: Sekien no Inganock
root.description: Originally released in 2007, Sekien no Inganock -What a Beautiful People- follows the story of Gii, a travelling doctor who dedicates his life to healing people in a closed of city of mutants. No-one in the city can remember the incident 10 years prior to the start of the game, known only as the 'Revival', but it is the cause of the inhabitants becoming part human, part animal. An english patch was released for the game in late 2009.
